<a id="EditorSceneFormatImporter"></a>

# EditorSceneFormatImporter

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [EditorSceneFormatImporterBlend](EditorSceneFormatImporterBlend.md), [EditorSceneFormatImporterFBX2GLTF](EditorSceneFormatImporterFBX2GLTF.md), [EditorSceneFormatImporterGLTF](EditorSceneFormatImporterGLTF.md), [EditorSceneFormatImporterUFBX](EditorSceneFormatImporterUFBX.md)

Imports scenes from third-parties' 3D files.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**EditorSceneFormatImporter** allows to define an importer script for a third-party 3D format.

To use **EditorSceneFormatImporter**, register it using the [EditorPlugin.add_scene_format_importer_plugin()](EditorPlugin.md#EditorPlugin_method_add_scene_format_importer_plugin) method first.

## Method Descriptions

<a id="EditorSceneFormatImporter_private_method__get_extensions"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedStringArray](PackedStringArray.md) **_get_extensions**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorSceneFormatImporter_private_method__get_extensions)

Return supported file extensions for this scene importer.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorSceneFormatImporter_private_method__get_import_options"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_get_import_options**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorSceneFormatImporter_private_method__get_import_options)

Override to add general import options. These will appear in the main import dock on the editor. Add options via [add_import_option()](EditorSceneFormatImporter.md#EditorSceneFormatImporter_method_add_import_option) and [add_import_option_advanced()](EditorSceneFormatImporter.md#EditorSceneFormatImporter_method_add_import_option_advanced).

\ **Note:** All **EditorSceneFormatImporter** and [EditorScenePostImportPlugin](EditorScenePostImportPlugin.md) instances will add options for all files. It is good practice to check the file extension when `path` is non-empty.

When the user is editing project settings, `path` will be empty. It is recommended to add all options when `path` is empty to allow the user to customize Import Defaults.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorSceneFormatImporter_private_method__get_option_visibility"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Variant](Variant.md) **_get_option_visibility**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md), for_animation\: [bool](bool.md), option\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorSceneFormatImporter_private_method__get_option_visibility)

Should return ``true`` to show the given option, ``false`` to hide the given option, or ``null`` to ignore.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorSceneFormatImporter_private_method__import_scene"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Object](Object.md) **_import_scene**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md), flags\: [int](int.md), options\: [Dictionary](Dictionary.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorSceneFormatImporter_private_method__import_scene)

Perform the bulk of the scene import logic here, for example using [GLTFDocument](GLTFDocument.md) or [FBXDocument](FBXDocument.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorSceneFormatImporter_method_add_import_option"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_import_option**\ (\ name\: [String](String.md), value\: [Variant](Variant.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorSceneFormatImporter_method_add_import_option)

Add a specific import option (name and default value only). This function can only be called from [_get_import_options()](EditorSceneFormatImporter.md#EditorSceneFormatImporter_private_method__get_import_options).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>
